00067 template<class Target> Target convertFromStr(const string& str)
00068 {
00069     stringstream convertor;
00070     Target result;
00071 
00072     if(!(convertor << str) || !(convertor >> result) || !(convertor >> ws).eof())
00073     {
00074         cerr << "error in converting value from " << str << ", use default value instead." << endl;
00075         return Target();
00076     }
00077 
00078     return result;
00079 }

00086 inline string* getMapValue(map<string, string>& map, const string& key)
00087 {
00088         std::map<string, string>::iterator itr = map.find( key );
00089         if( itr == map.end() )
00090                 return 0;
00091         return &itr->second;
00092 }

00105     {
00106         if(! removeFile(tempUserDic_))

00118 bool JMA_Knowledge::hasUserDict() const

00120     return ! userDictNames_.empty();

00123 bool JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()
00124 {
00125     const size_t userDictNum = userDictNames_.size();
00126 
00127 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00128     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()" << endl;
00129     if(userDictNum != 0)
00130     {
00131         cout << "user dictionary: ";
00132         for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00133         {
00134             cout << userDictNames_[i] << " ";
00135         }
00136         cout << endl;
00137     }
00138 #endif
00139 
00140     if(userDictNum == 0)
00141     {
00142         return false;
00143     }
00144 
00145     // remove the temporary user binary file if exists
00146     if(! tempUserDic_.empty())
00147     {
00148         if(! removeFile(tempUserDic_))
00149         {
00150             cerr << "fail to delete tempUserDic_ file: " << tempUserDic_ << endl;
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     // temporary csv file for user dictionary
00155     string tempUserCSVFile;
00156 
00157     // convert user dictionaries to a csv file
00158     if(! createTempFile(tempUserCSVFile))
00159     {
00160         cerr << "fail to create a temporary user dictionary csv file" << endl;
00161         return false;
00162     }
00163 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00164     cout << "temporary file name of user csv file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00165 #endif
00166 
00167     ofstream ostream(tempUserCSVFile.c_str());
00168     if(! ostream)
00169     {
00170         cerr << "fail to open temporary user CSV file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173 
00174     // append source files of user dictionary
00175     unsigned int entryCount = 0;
00176     for(size_t i=0; i<userDictNum; ++i)
00177         entryCount += convertTxtToCSV(userDictNames_[i].c_str(), ostream);
00178 
00179 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00180     cout << entryCount << " entries in user dictionaries altogether." << endl;
00181 #endif
00182     if(entryCount == 0)
00183     {
00184         cerr << "fail to compile the empty user dictionary." << endl;
00185         return false;
00186     }
00187 
00188     // create a unique temporary file for user dictionary in binary type
00189     bool tempResult = createTempFile(tempUserDic_);
00190     if(! tempResult)
00191     {
00192         cerr << "fail to create a temporary user dictionary binary file" << endl;
00193         return false;
00194     }
00195 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00196     cout << "temporary file name of binary user dictionary: " << tempUserDic_ << endl;
00197 #endif
00198 
00199     // construct parameter to compile user dictionary
00200     vector<char*> compileParam;
00201     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00202     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00203     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(systemDictPath_.c_str()));
00204     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-u");
00205     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(tempUserDic_.c_str()));
00206 
00207     // the encoding type of text user dictionary could be predefined by the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file under binary system directory path,
00208     // if the text encoding type is not predefined in "dicrc", it would be "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00209     // below is to set the encoding type of binary user dictionary, which is "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00210     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00211     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(ENCODE_TYPE_STR_[getEncodeType()]));
00212 
00213     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(tempUserCSVFile.c_str()));
00214 
00215 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00216     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile user dictionary: ";
00217     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00218     {
00219         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00220     }
00221     cout << endl;
00222 #endif
00223 
00224     // compile user dictionary files into binary type
00225     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00226     if(compileResult != 0)
00227     {
00228         cerr << "fail to compile user ditionary" << endl;
00229         return false;
00230     }
00231 
00232     // as the binary user dictionary is created,
00233     // remove the temporary user csv file
00234     if(! removeFile(tempUserCSVFile))
00235     {
00236         cerr << "fail to delete tempUserCSVFile file: " << tempUserCSVFile << endl;
00237     }
00238 
00239     return true;
00240 }

00242 MeCab::Tagger* JMA_Knowledge::createTagger() const
00243 {
00244     // construct parameter to create tagger
00245     string taggerParam("-d ");
00246     taggerParam += systemDictPath_;
00247 
00248     if(hasUserDict())
00249     {
00250         assert(! tempUserDic_.empty() && "the temporary file of user dictionary in binary format should have been created by JMA_Knowledge::compileUserDict()");
00251 
00252         // append the name of user dictionary binary file to the parameter of tagger creation
00253         taggerParam += " -u ";
00254         taggerParam += tempUserDic_;
00255     }
00256 
00257 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00258     cout << "parameter of MeCab::createTagger() to create MeCab::Tagger: " << taggerParam << endl << endl;
00259 #endif
00260 
00261     // create tagger by loading dictioanry files
00262     return MeCab::createTagger(taggerParam.c_str());
00263 }

00270 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadPOSDef()
00271 {
00272     // file "pos-id.def"
00273     string posFileName = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00274 
00275     // load POS table
00276     if(! posTable_.loadConfig(posFileName.c_str()))
00277     {
00278         cerr << "fail in POSTable::loadConfig() to load " << posFileName << endl;
00279     }
00280 
00281     // get POS category number
00282     ifstream posFile(posFileName.c_str());
00283     if(! posFile)
00284     {
00285         cerr << "fail in JMA_Knowledge::loadPOSDef() to load " << posFileName << endl;
00286         return false;
00287     }
00288 
00289     // read in a non-emtpy line
00290     string line;
00291     while(getline(posFile, line) && line.empty()) ;
00292 
00293     // the format of the line is assumed such like "その他,間投,*,* 0"
00294     if(! line.empty())
00295     {
00296         // remove characters starting from space
00297         line.erase(line.find_first_of(" \t"));
00298 
00299         // count the number of separator ','
00300         int count = 0;
00301         for(size_t i=0; i<line.size(); ++i)
00302         {
00303             if(line[i] == ',')
00304             {
00305                 ++count;
00306             }
00307         }
00308         posCatNum_ = count + 1;
00309     }
00310 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00311     cout << posCatNum_ << " POS categories in " << posFileName << endl;
00312 #endif
00313 
00314     return true;
00315 }
00316 
00317 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadConfig0(const char *filename, map<string, string>& map) {
00318   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00319   if(!ifs)
00320   {
00321       cerr << "cannot open configuration file: " << filename << endl;
00322       return false;
00323   }
00324 
00325   std::string line;
00326   while (std::getline(ifs, line)) {
00327     // remove carriage return character
00328     line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00329 
00330     if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#') continue;
00331 
00332     size_t pos = line.find('=');
00333     if(pos == std::string::npos)
00334     {
00335         cerr << "format error in configuration file: " << filename << ", line: " << line << endl;
00336         return false;
00337     }
00338 
00339     size_t s1, s2;
00340     for (s1 = pos+1; s1 < line.size() && isspace(line[s1]); s1++);
00341     for (s2 = pos-1; static_cast<long>(s2) >= 0 && isspace(line[s2]); s2--);
00342     //const std::string value = line.substr(s1, line.size() - s1);
00343     //const std::string key   = line.substr(0, s2 + 1);
00344     map[line.substr(0, s2 + 1)] = line.substr(s1, line.size() - s1);
00345   }
00346 
00347   return true;
00348 }
00349 
00350 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig()
00351 {
00352     string configFile = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), DICT_CONFIG_FILES[0]);
00353     map<string, string> configMap;
00354 
00355     if(! loadConfig0(configFile.c_str(), configMap))
00356     {
00357         return false;
00358     }
00359 
00360     string* value = getMapValue(configMap, "base-form-feature-offset");
00361     baseFormOffset_ = value ? convertFromStr<int>(*value) : BASE_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00362 
00363     value = getMapValue(configMap, "feature-token-size");
00364     featureTokenSize_ = value ? convertFromStr<size_t>(*value) : FEATURE_TOKEN_SIZE_DEFAULT;
00365 
00366     value = getMapValue(configMap, "default-pos");
00367     defaultPOS_ = value ? *value : DEFAULT_POS_DEFAULT;
00368 
00369 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00370     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDictConfig(), configFile: " << configFile << ", base form feature offset: " << baseFormOffset_
00371          << ", feature token size: " << featureTokenSize_
00372          << ", defaut POS: " << defaultPOS_ << endl;
00373 #endif
00374 
00375     return true;
00376 }

00378 bool JMA_Knowledge::loadPOSFeatureMapping()
00379 {
00380         string configFile = createFilePath(systemDictPath_.c_str(), POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00381         posFeatureMap_.clear();
00382         return loadConfig0( configFile.c_str(), posFeatureMap_ );

00384 
00385 int JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()
00386 {
00387     if(! loadPOSDef())
00388     {
00389         // if no "pos-id.def" exists,
00390         // the default value of POS category number would be used.
00391         posCatNum_ = POS_CAT_NUM_DEFAULT;
00392     }
00393 
00394     if(! loadDictConfig())
00395     {
00396         // if "dicrc" loading failed,
00397         // the default value of base form feature offset would be used.
00398         baseFormOffset_ = BASE_FORM_OFFSET_DEFAULT;
00399         // also set other default value
00400         featureTokenSize_ = FEATURE_TOKEN_SIZE_DEFAULT;
00401         defaultPOS_ = DEFAULT_POS_DEFAULT;
00402     }
00403 
00404     if(! loadPOSFeatureMapping() )
00405         cerr<< "Fail to load POS - Feature Mapping, User dictionary can't work"<<endl;
00406     else
00407         defaultFeature_ = getMapValue(posFeatureMap_, defaultPOS_);
00408 
00409 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00410     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00411     cout << "system dictionary path: " << systemDictPath_ << endl;
00412 #endif
00413 
00414     if(hasUserDict())
00415     {
00416         if(! compileUserDict())
00417         {
00418             cerr << "fail to compile user dictionary in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00419             return 0;
00420         }
00421     }
00422 
00423     // load into temporary instance to check the result
00424     MeCab::Tagger* tagger = createTagger();
00425     if(! tagger)
00426     {
00427         cerr << "fail to create MeCab::Tagger in JMA_Knowledge::loadDict()" << endl;
00428         return 0;
00429     }
00430 
00431     // destroy the temporary instance
00432     delete tagger;
00433 
00434     return 1;
00435 }

00437 int JMA_Knowledge::loadStopWordDict(const char* fileName)
00438 {
00439         ifstream in(fileName);
00440     if(!in)
00441     {
00442         cerr << "cannot open file: " << fileName << endl;
00443         return 0;
00444     }
00445 
00446         string line;
00447         while(!in.eof())
00448         {
00449                 getline(in, line);
00450                 if(line.length() <= 0)
00451                         continue;
00452                 stopWords_.insert(line);
00453         }
00454         in.close();
00455         return 1;
00456 }

00458 int JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict(const char* txtDirPath, const char* binDirPath)
00459 {
00460     assert(txtDirPath && binDirPath);
00461 
00462 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00463     cout << "JMA_Knowledge::encodeSystemDict()" << endl;
00464     cout << "path of source system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00465     cout << "path of binary system dictionary: " << binDirPath << endl;
00466 #endif
00467 
00468     // check if the directory paths exist
00469     if(isDirExist(txtDirPath) == false)
00470     {
00471         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << txtDirPath << endl;
00472         return 0;
00473     }
00474     if(isDirExist(binDirPath) == false)
00475     {
00476         cerr << "directory path not exist to compile system dictionary: " << binDirPath << endl;
00477         return 0;
00478     }
00479 
00480     // construct parameter to compile system dictionary
00481     vector<char*> compileParam;
00482     compileParam.push_back((char*)"JMA_Knowledge");
00483     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-d");
00484     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(txtDirPath));
00485     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-o");
00486     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(binDirPath));
00487 
00488     // the source encoding type could be predefined by the "dictionary-charset" entry in "dicrc" file under source directory path,
00489     // if the source encoding type is not predefined in "dicrc", it would be "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00490     // below is to set the destination encoding type, which is "EUC-JP" defaultly.
00491     compileParam.push_back((char*)"-t");
00492     compileParam.push_back(const_cast<char*>(ENCODE_TYPE_STR_[getEncodeType()]));
00493 
00494 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00495     cout << "parameter of mecab_dict_index() to compile system dictionary: ";
00496     for(size_t i=0; i<compileParam.size(); ++i)
00497     {
00498         cout << compileParam[i] << " ";
00499     }
00500     cout << endl;
00501 #endif
00502 
00503     // compile system dictionary files into binary type
00504     int compileResult = mecab_dict_index(compileParam.size(), &compileParam[0]);
00505     if(compileResult != 0)
00506     {
00507         cerr << "fail to compile system ditionary" << endl;
00508         return 0;
00509     }
00510 
00511     // copy configure and definition files to the destination directory
00512     size_t configNum = sizeof(DICT_CONFIG_FILES) / sizeof(DICT_CONFIG_FILES[0]);
00513     string src, dest;
00514     for(size_t i=0; i<configNum; ++i)
00515     {
00516         src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILES[i]);
00517         dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, DICT_CONFIG_FILES[i]);
00518 
00519         if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00520         {
00521             return 0;
00522         }
00523     }
00524 
00525     // if pos-id.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00526     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00527     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_ID_DEF_FILE);
00528     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00529     {
00530         cout << POS_ID_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", default POS index would be 1." << endl;
00531     }
00532 
00533     // if pos-feature.def exists, copy it to the destination directory
00534     src = createFilePath(txtDirPath, POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00535     dest = createFilePath(binDirPath, POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE);
00536     if(copyFile(src.c_str(), dest.c_str()) == false)
00537     {
00538         cout << POS_FEATURE_DEF_FILE << " is not found in " << txtDirPath << ", no default feature is defined for those words in user dictionary." << endl;
00539     }
00540 
00541     return 1;
00542 }

00544 bool JMA_Knowledge::isStopWord(const string& word) const
00545 {
00546         return stopWords_.find(word) != stopWords_.end() || ctype_->isSpace(word.c_str());
00547 }

00559 bool JMA_Knowledge::createTempFile(std::string& tempName)
00560 {
00561 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00562     // directory name for temporary file
00563     char dirName[MAX_PATH];
00564 
00565     // retrieve the directory path designated for temporary files
00566     DWORD dirResult = GetTempPath(MAX_PATH, dirName);
00567     if(dirResult == 0)
00568     {
00569         cerr << "fail in GetTempPath() to get the directory path for temporary file" << endl;
00570         return false;
00571     }
00572 
00573     // file name for temporary file
00574     char fileName[MAX_PATH];
00575 
00576     // create a unique temporary file
00577     UINT nameResult = GetTempFileName(dirName, "jma", 0, fileName);
00578     if(nameResult == 0)
00579     {
00580         cerr << "fail in GetTempFileName() to create a temporary file" << endl;
00581         return false;
00582     }
00583 
00584     tempName = fileName;
00585 #else
00586     // file name for temporary file
00587     char fileName[] = "/tmp/jmaXXXXXX";
00588 
00589     // create a unique temporary file
00590     int tempFd = mkstemp(fileName);
00591     if(tempFd == -1)
00592     {
00593         cerr << "fail in mkstemp() to create a temporary file" << endl;
00594         return false;
00595     }
00596 
00597     tempName = fileName;
00598 #endif
00599 
00600     return true;
00601 }
00602 
00603 bool JMA_Knowledge::removeFile(const std::string& fileName)

00605     if(unlink(fileName.c_str()) == 0)
00606     {
00607         return true;
00608     }
00609     else
00610     {
00611         return false;
00612     }
00613 }
00614 
00615 bool JMA_Knowledge::isDirExist(const char* dirPath)
00616 {
00617     if(dirPath == 0)
00618     {
00619         return false;
00620     }
00621 
00622     bool result = false;
00623 
00624 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00625     WIN32_FIND_DATA wfd;
00626     HANDLE hFind;
00627 
00628     // the parameter string in function "FindFirstFile()" would be invalid if it ends with a trailing backslash (\) or slash (/),
00629     // so the trailing backslash or slash is removed if it exists
00630     string dirStr(dirPath);
00631     size_t len = dirStr.size();
00632     if(len > 0 && (dirPath[len-1] == '\\'  || dirPath[len-1] == '/' ))
00633     {
00634         dirStr.erase(len-1, 1);
00635     }
00636 
00637     hFind = FindFirstFile(dirStr.c_str(), &wfd);
00638     if(hFind != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00639     {
00640         result = true;
00641     }
00642     FindClose(hFind);
00643 #else
00644     DIR *dir = opendir(dirPath);
00645     if(dir)
00646     {
00647         result = true;
00648     }
00649     closedir(dir);
00650 #endif
00651 
00652     return result;
00653 }
00654 
00655 bool JMA_Knowledge::copyFile(const char* src, const char* dest)
00656 {
00657     assert(src && dest);
00658 
00659     // open files
00660     ifstream from(src);
00661     if(! from)
00662     {
00663         cerr << "cannot open source file: " << src << endl;
00664         return false;
00665     }
00666 
00667     ofstream to(dest);
00668     if(! to)
00669     {
00670         cerr << "cannot open destinatioin file: " << dest << endl;
00671         return false;
00672     }
00673 
00674     // copy characters
00675     char ch;
00676     while(from.get(ch))
00677     {
00678         to.put(ch);
00679     }
00680 
00681     // check file state
00682     if(!from.eof() || !to)
00683     {
00684         cerr << "invalid file state after copy from " << src << " to " << dest << endl;
00685         return false;
00686     }
00687 
00688     return true;
00689 }
00690 
00691 std::string JMA_Knowledge::createFilePath(const char* dir, const char* file)
00692 {
00693     assert(file && "the file name is assumed as non empty");
00694 
00695     string result = dir;
00696 
00697 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00698     if(result.size() && result[result.size()-1] != '\\')
00699     {
00700         result += '\\';
00701     }
00702 #else
00703     if(result.size() && result[result.size()-1] != '/')
00704     {
00705         result += '/';
00706     }
00707 #endif
00708 
00709     result += file;
00710     return result;
00711 }
00712 
00713 JMA_CType* JMA_Knowledge::getCType()
00714 {
00715         return ctype_;
00716 }
00717 
00718 void JMA_Knowledge::onEncodeTypeChange(EncodeType type)
00719 {
00720         delete ctype_;
00721         ctype_ = JMA_CType::instance(type);
00722 }
00723 
00724 bool JMA_Knowledge::isSentenceSeparator(const char* p)
00725 {
00726         unsigned int bytes = ctype_->getByteCount(p);
00727         const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)p;
00728 
00729         switch(bytes)
00730         {
00731                 case 1:
00732                         return seps_[1].contains( uc[0] );
00733                 case 2:
00734                         return seps_[2].contains( uc[0] << 8 | uc[1]);
00735                 case 3:
00736                         return seps_[3].contains( uc[0] << 16 | uc[1] << 8 | uc[2] );
00737                 case 4:
00738                         return seps_[4].contains( uc[0] << 24 | uc[1] << 16 | uc[2] << 8 | uc[3] );
00739                 default:
00740                         assert(false && "Cannot handle Character's length > 4");
00741         }
00742 
00743         return false;
00744 }
00745 
00746 bool JMA_Knowledge::addSentenceSeparator(unsigned int val)
00747 {
00748         return seps_[getOccupiedBytes(val)].insert(val);
00749 }
00750 
00751 unsigned int JMA_Knowledge::getOccupiedBytes(unsigned int val)
00752 {
00753         unsigned int ret = 1;
00754         while( val & 0xffffff00 )
00755         {
00756                 val >>= 4;
00757                 ++ ret;
00758         }
00759         assert( ret > 0 && ret < 4 );
00760         return ret;
00761 }
00762 
00763 int JMA_Knowledge::loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(const char* fileName)
00764 {
00765         ifstream in(fileName);
00766     if(!in)
00767     {
00768         cerr << "cannot open file: " << fileName << endl;
00769         return 0;
00770     }
00771 
00772         string line;
00773         while(!in.eof())
00774         {
00775                  getline(in, line);
00776                 //ignore the empty line and comment line(start with '#')
00777                 if( line.empty() || line[0] == '#' )
00778                         continue;
00779                 unsigned int bytes = ctype_->getByteCount( line.c_str() );
00780 
00781                 const unsigned char* uc = (const unsigned char*)line.c_str();
00782 
00783                 switch(bytes)
00784                 {
00785                         case 1:
00786                                 seps_[1].insert( uc[0] );
00787                                 break;
00788                         case 2:
00789                                 seps_[2].insert( uc[0] << 8 | uc[1]);
00790                                 break;
00791                         case 3:
00792                                 seps_[3].insert( uc[0] << 16 | uc[1] << 8 | uc[2] );
00793                                 break;
00794                         case 4:
00795                                 seps_[4].insert( uc[0] << 24 | uc[1] << 16 | uc[2] << 8 | uc[3] );
00796                                 break;
00797                         default:
00798                                 assert(false && "Cannot handle 'Character's length > 4'");
00799                                 break;
00800                 }
00801         }
00802         in.close();
00803         return 1;
00804 }
00805 
00806 bool JMA_Knowledge::isDictFeature( const char* str, bool includeWord )
00807 {
00808         size_t tokenSize = includeWord ? 0 : 1;
00809         while(*str)
00810         {
00811                 if(*str == ',')
00812                         ++tokenSize;
00813                 ++str;
00814         }
00815         return tokenSize == featureTokenSize_;
00816 }
00817 
00818 unsigned int JMA_Knowledge::convertTxtToCSV(const char* userDicFile, ofstream& ostream)
00819 {
00820     unsigned int count = 0;
00821 
00822         ifstream in(userDicFile);
00823         if( !in )
00824         {
00825                 cerr << "Can't Find User Dictionary " << userDicFile << ", and IGNORE this file." << endl;
00826                 return count;
00827         }
00828 
00829         cout<<"Converting User Dictionary " << userDicFile << " ..." << endl;
00830 
00831         string line;
00832         while( !in.eof() )
00833         {
00834                 getline(in, line);
00835                 trimSelf(line);
00836                 if(line.empty())
00837                         continue;
00838 
00839                 vector<string> vec;
00840                 stringToVector( line, vec );
00841                 if(vec.empty())
00842                         continue;
00843 
00844                 size_t vecSize = vec.size();
00845                 string& word = vec[0];
00846                 if( vecSize == 1 )
00847                 {
00848                         if( isDictFeature( word.c_str(), true) )
00849                                 ostream << word << endl;
00850                         else if( defaultFeature_ )
00851                                 ostream << vec[0] << "," << *defaultFeature_ << endl;
00852             ++count;
00853                         continue;
00854                 }
00855 
00856                 set<string> usedFeatures;
00857                 for( size_t i = 1; i < vecSize; ++i )
00858                 {
00859                         string& posOrFec = vec[i];
00860                         // posOrFec is a feature itself
00861                         if( isDictFeature( posOrFec.c_str() ) )
00862                         {
00863                                 //don't insert duplicate entry
00864                                 if( usedFeatures.find(posOrFec) == usedFeatures.end() )
00865                                 {
00866                                         ostream << word << "," << posOrFec << endl;
00867                     ++count;
00868                                         usedFeatures.insert(posOrFec);
00869                                 }
00870                         }
00871                         else
00872                         {
00873                                 string* fec = getMapValue( posFeatureMap_, posOrFec );
00874                                 //don't insert duplicate entry
00875                                 if( fec )
00876                                 {
00877                                         if( usedFeatures.find( *fec ) == usedFeatures.end() )
00878                                         {
00879                                                 ostream << word << "," << *fec << endl;
00880                         ++count;
00881                                                 usedFeatures.insert( *fec );
00882                                         }
00883                                 }
00884                                 else
00885                                         cerr << "Can't find POS for " << posOrFec << endl;
00886                         }
00887                 }
00888 
00889                 if( usedFeatures.empty() && defaultFeature_ )
00890                 {
00891                         ostream << vec[0] << "," << *defaultFeature_ << endl;
00892             ++count;
00893                 }
00894         }
00895 
00896     return count;
00897 }
